name: Lucian Condrea
bio: Self-taught and battle-tested developer since 2017. I love grokking systems and simplifying them. Working on Tribe Social (tribesocial.io). Passionate about skateboarding and soil health.
title: My Journey With Software Testing
description: You've heard you should be testing your software. But I've found that without a proper testing strategy and solid habits, you're unlikely to get very far. Come hear how I learned and formed a habit of testing and crafted my go-to testing strategy.
